info.name: Dark Signer Kiryu Kyosuke - Tumblr Theme
info.description:
A quick theme I made with some help of Dark Signer Kyosuke Kiryu (Kiryu Kyosuke/Kalin Kessler) from Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's ^.^
I got the image from --> http://static.zerochan.net/Kiryu.Kyosuke.full.323853.jpg But I did make some slight modifications to work with the theme.
And I got the CSS from --> http://userstyles.org/styles/72070/yubel-judai-tumblr-theme
(Yes, I got the CSS from someone else, I'm not that good with coding. That's why I'm giving credit to the person I got it from)
Without those two I wouldn't have this theme at all! So thank you!
And to those who use it, enjoy!
info.additionalInfo:
This theme automatically applies itself to every site. For Chrome users,if you want to changed this and make it only apply to tumblr open the stylish icon on the chrome taskbar, click edit. From there it'll give you the code and an 'applies to' area. Click specify, change to 'URLs starting with' and put http://www.tumblr.com/ do the same again but make it https://www.tumblr.com/ this way it will also apply when it's at the log in page
You can make this apply to other sites if you want.
For firfox users, I would like to think you would go about this in a similar method if you didn't want this all over your internet
